meaning: Cannot hold back; unable to restrain; cannot control

examples.chinese: 有点搂不住的想千言万语～废话连篇
examples.translation: I can't hold back the thousands of words I want to say ~ so much nonsense.

examples.chinese: 这天气,这温度太哇塞了,实在是搂不住了
examples.translation: This weather, this temperature is amazing, I really can't contain myself.

examples.chinese: 积压的情绪再怎么收也搂不住了
examples.translation: The pent-up emotions can no longer be held back, no matter how much I try to contain them.
